description: This Dart source file defines an HTTP request interceptor for Flutter using the Dio package. The AuthInterceptor class attaches authorization headers to outgoing requests and handles 401 Unauthorized responses by clearing stored tokens and executing a callback.

classes.name: AuthInterceptor
classes.description: A Dio interceptor that attaches Authorization headers and handles 401 responses. It optionally executes a callback when an unauthorized response is encountered.

methods.name: AuthInterceptor
methods.description: Constructor optionally accepting a callback to handle 401 responses.

methods.name: onRequest
methods.description: Intercepts outgoing requests to add the Authorization header if a token is available.

methods.name: onError
methods.description: Intercepts errors, particularly handling 401 Unauthorized responses by clearing stored tokens and invoking an optional callback.
